body:
We all heard that Avicus is closing but people have bought gold,emerald,diamond ,and ect. But I don't think this is fair they get to keep the money! I wan't my money back who else? It's a tragedy I know, but we have begged our parents for the money to buy this I ain't gonna take this! I want my money back my $20 bucks I used the coupon AVICORE when it came back.



WHO WANTS THERE MONEY BACK?

title: Money back?
